message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $120. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it at the special introductory price of $110?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discount, I'm looking to spend closer to $105.  Would you be willing to meet me there?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In order to accommodate you while still ensuring we receive a fair value for our product, I am willing to offer the premium product at $107. This price reflects the value we place on the product while also considering your offer. Would this be acceptable for you?
